item.title: A number of dug holes left after gas works, 7th July
item.description:
The holes were dug by the work team and left after the gas works were completed I asked a worker if they would fill in the holes that were drilled they said they would be back tomorrow that was over a week ago. Someone walking past with a walking stick could easily trip or loose their balance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seaton Road, East Wickham, London

item.title: Failed Bulky Collection, 7th July
item.description:
Booked bulky collection for 3rd July, you removed waste from my neighbour who had not booked a collection, many phone calls to resolve but no real help also takes best part of an hour to get through, promised call a back didnt happen , e mails not answered either, left little choice other than to put here for help, Veolia phone number does not work either

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palace View, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights causing too much nuisance, 7th July
item.description:
There's serious issues with the temporary traffic lights set here, for the past 2 weeks since 5am to 11am the beeping and honking of cars right outside have now gone beyond tolerance. Either put up more signs There's traffic lights or divert traffic away from Pritchard Road or hurry up and finish the work and stop wasting tax payers money
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goldsmiths' Row, Haggerston, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and uneven pavement stones with visible gaps and holes between the slabs., 7th July
item.description:
The pavement stones are loose and uneven, with gaps and holes that create a clear trip hazard. This has been an issue for some time and poses a risk of injury to pedestrians, especially those who are elderly, disabled, or pushing prams.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham Hill Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
